Pr\u00e9requis: Etre inscrit au Mastère Spécialisé "Infrastructure Project Finance"
Objectifs du module: 1- To give the students an overlook of the Program and to teach advanced topics in Project Finance; 2- To train students to the analysis of Project and Financing contracts; to teach them how to negotiate such contracts, through role-playing; 3- To train the students to bid for a Project Finance Project.
Programme du module: Business game This case is practiced in using real documentation. It is worked out during three 2.5 days sessions and cover financial, legal and technical aspects. The class is split in four groups, one representing the public authority and the three others being the competing consortia. They are sponsored by project managers from Meridiam Infrastructure, Vinci-Concessions and Eiffage. Each group is also helped by a lawyer from Linklaters. All those sponsors are major stakeholders in the Project Finance area. Evaluation : Qualité des analyses et des prestations
